info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 10:33PM MDT until April 22 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM MDT/MIDNIGHT CDT/ FOR EASTERN CHEYENNE AND SOUTHEASTERN KIT CARSON COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL COLORADO...NORTHWESTERN WICHITA AND WALLACE COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL KANSAS...WESTERN THOMAS COUNTY IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS...WESTERN LOGAN...NORTHERN GREELEY COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL KANSAS AND SHERMAN COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS... At 1031 PM MDT/1131 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Ruleton to 10 miles north of Horace, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 1030 PM MDT quarter sized hail was reported in Weskan. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Goodland, Sharon Springs, Brewster, Kanorado, Ruleton, Weskan and Wallace. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 0 and 41. Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 441 and 450. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
